survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from hybrid vehicle owners about their maintenance experiences, including satisfaction with service providers, costs, and overall reliability.

questions.question_text: What is the make and model of your primary hybrid vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to capture detailed responses. Ensure the input field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What is the make and model of your primary hybrid vehicle?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall maintenance experience for your hybrid vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall maintenance experience for your hybrid vehicle?

questions.question_text: What types of maintenance services have you required for your hybrid vehicle in the past year? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes), with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What types of maintenance services have you required for your hybrid vehicle in the past year? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your estimated annual cost for hybrid vehicle maintenance?
questions.client_notes: Use predefined ranges for easier analysis. Ensure the ranges are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: What is your estimated annual cost for hybrid vehicle maintenance?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for hybrid vehicle maintenance services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to capture detailed suggestions. Ensure the field is large enough for lengthy responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for hybrid vehicle maintenance services?
